sources.title: Beverly H | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller
sources.description:
Beverly H. is set in Beverly Hills, California.  It focuses on Beverly Hightower, founder and CEO of Fortress Biotech and Dr. Robert Karsten â€œDr. Bobâ€ to his friends, her top scientist and creator of the first life extension drug.  Life is complex and messy; Beverly H. reflects this with endless shades of grey.  The film's black swan event effects every person alive, giving the series viewers a different, but relatable alternate reality.
2022.  Stars: Dionne Jones, P.J. Marino, Scottie Jefferies

metadata.Plot: A Beverly Hills CEO has 24 hours to deal with her cheating husband, protect her company from a corporate raider and decide if the world is ready for the first commercial life extension drug.
metadata.Actors: Dionne Jones, P.J. Marino, Scottie Jefferies
